attributes.action: Ban van drivers from parking on corners.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Traffic enforcement, including parking, is a matter for local authorities

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
